trans-unit.source: Provides properties that describe the service credentials used for Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper som beskriver service-legitimasjonen som brukes for Windows-godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: This class provides two settings.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir to innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.AllowAnonymousLogons%2A> property to allow the anonymous logon of clients by setting it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.AllowAnonymousLogons%2A>til å tillate anonym pålogging av klienter ved å sette verdien `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.AllowAnonymousLogons%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then avoid disclosing the client's identity to the service by setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowedImpersonationLevel%2A> to `Anonymous`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå å avsløre klientens identitet til tjenesten ved å angi <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowedImpersonationLevel%2A>til `Anonymous`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsClientCredential.AllowedImpersonationLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> property is set to `true` (the default setting), the service can determine the Windows groups to which the client belongs.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>er satt til `true` (standardinnstillingen), tjenesten kan fastsette Windows-grupper som klienten tilhører.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WindowsServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allowanonymous users access (applies only to message-level security).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å allowanonymous brukere få tilgang til (gjelder bare for sikkerhet på radnivå melding).

trans-unit.source: When using Windows client credentials on a binding, by default the system does not allow anonymous access.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker Windows-legitimasjonen for klienten i en binding, som standard tillater systemet ikke anonym tilgang.

trans-unit.source: This means that only domain or workgroup authenticated users are allowed into the system.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at bare domenet eller arbeidsgruppen godkjente brukere får tilgang til systemet.

trans-unit.source: However, in certain cases it is acceptable for anonymous, unauthenticated users to access the service.
trans-unit.target: Men i enkelte tilfeller er den godkjent for anonym, ikke godkjente brukere tilgang til tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: In this case you can set this property to `true` to allow anonymous clients to call the service.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet kan du angi denne egenskapen `true` å tillate anonym klienter å kalle tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: A service that enables anonymous authentication is significantly loosening the security requirements, so this setting should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target: En tjeneste som muliggjør anonym godkjenning er betydelig å øke sikkerhetskrav, så denne innstillingen bør brukes med forsiktig.

trans-unit.source: Note that this property does not apply to transport security scenarios and applies only when message security is used by the underlying binding to secure the messages.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for transport sikkerhet scenarier og gjelder bare når sikkerhet for melding brukes av den underliggende bindingen til å sikre meldingene.

trans-unit.source: If Windows transport security is used, this property does not apply.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Windows transportsikkerhet brukes, gjelder ikke denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if anonymous users are allowed access; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis anonyme brukere er tillatt access. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the Windows groups that a client belongs to are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som indikerer om Windows-grupper som tilhører en klient er inkludert i sikkerhetskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios, knowing which Windows groups users belong to provides useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Vel vitende om som er koblet til Windows-grupper i de fleste tilfeller gir nyttig informasjon om godkjenning avgjørelsene.

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis Windows-grupper kreves, når egenskapen settes `false` kan forbedre ytelsen ved at en full-gruppe kravet populasjon.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Windows-grupper er inkludert i sikkerhetskonteksten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
